[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” next_background_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”4.4.5″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#f6992b” background_color_gradient_end=”#284667″ background_color_gradient_direction=”122deg” background_color_gradient_start_position=”50%” background_color_gradient_end_position=”0%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”8px||8px||true|false” bottom_divider_style=”arrow2″ bottom_divider_height=”173px” bottom_divider_style_tablet=”” bottom_divider_style_phone=”” bottom_divider_style_last_edited=”on|tablet” bottom_divider_height_tablet=”80px” bottom_divider_height_phone=”62px” bottom_divider_height_last_edited=”on|phone”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”your 360 solution” subhead=”We’ve Been Waiting For You” header_fullscreen=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.5″ title_font=”Open Sans|800||on|||||” title_text_align=”center” title_text_color=”#ffffff” title_font_size=”53px” subhead_font=”|600||on|||||” subhead_text_align=”center” subhead_font_size=”24px” background_enable_color=”off” custom_margin=”-51px|||||” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_style=”slide”][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.5″][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Your solution to online brand growth” subhead=”Your wholesale retailer” _builder_version=”4.4.5″ title_font=”|600||on|||||” title_text_align=”center” title_text_color=”#F6992B” title_font_size=”18px” content_text_align=”center” content_text_color=”#000000″ content_line_height=”2em” subhead_font=”Open Sans|700||on|||||” subhead_text_align=”center” subhead_text_color=”#284667″ subhead_font_size=”40px” subhead_line_height=”1.3em” background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”80px|||||” animation_style=”fade”]

We’ll purchase your product and use our online infrastructure inventory management tracking and proven strategies to grow your brand online    

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ custom_padding=”0px|||||”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ width=”100%” max_width=”1169px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”60px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″][et_pb_blurb title=”Fulfillment” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%110%%” icon_color=”#e02b20″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”20px” body_text_align=”center”]

We have plenty of warehouse space to spare and also use Amazon FBA to tap into the Prime crowd.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″][et_pb_blurb title=”Marketplaces” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%144%%” icon_color=”#EA3228″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”20px” body_text_align=”center”]

We have a department dedicated just to our marketplaces to ensure traffic, sales and growth.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″][et_pb_blurb title=”Ads & PPC” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%75%%” icon_color=”#e02b20″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”20px” body_text_align=”center”]

We are so confident that we can grow your brand that we pay for all online ads and pay per click services ourselves.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.4.5″ background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#284667″ background_color_gradient_end=”#F6992B” background_color_gradient_start_position=”57%” background_color_gradient_end_position=”0%” hover_enabled=”0″ custom_padding=”||2px|||” bottom_divider_height=”183px”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ width=”86.3%” hover_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://sparkden.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/sec-03.png” title_text=”sec-03″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ scroll_vertical_motion_enable=”on” hover_enabled=”0″ scroll_vertical_motion_tablet=”0|50|50|100|4|0|-4″ scroll_vertical_motion_phone=”” scroll_vertical_motion_last_edited=”on|tablet” box_shadow_color_tablet=”” box_shadow_color_phone=”” box_shadow_color_last_edited=”on|desktop” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” box_shadow_color__hover=”#000000″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.5″ header_3_font=”|600|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#ffffff” background_color=”#e02b20″ width=”73%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”70px|||||” custom_padding=”5px|0px||0px|false|true”]

Location. Location. Location.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.5″ header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_text_align=”left” header_2_text_color=”#162334″ header_2_font_size=”45px” hover_enabled=”0″]

Increase Sales

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.5″ text_text_color=”#CAE9FF” custom_margin=”-39px|||||” custom_padding=”|0px||||” hover_enabled=”0″ text_font_size=”16px”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.5″ header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_text_align=”left” header_2_text_color=”#162334″ header_2_font_size=”45px” hover_enabled=”0″]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.5″ text_text_color=”#CAE9FF” custom_margin=”-39px|||||” custom_padding=”|0px||||” hover_enabled=”0″ text_font_size=”16px”]

Best Practices

 

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.5″ text_text_color=”#CAE9FF” custom_margin=”-83px|||||” hover_enabled=”0″ text_font_size=”16px”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.5″ header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_text_align=”left” header_2_text_color=”#ffffff” header_2_font_size=”45px”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.5″ custom_margin_tablet=”-25px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.5″ header_3_font=”|600|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#ffffff” background_color=”#e02b20″ width=”31%” width_tablet=”44%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”70px|||||” custom_padding=”5px|0px||0px|false|true”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.5″ header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_text_align=”left” header_2_text_color=”#ffffff” header_2_font_size=”45px”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.5″ custom_margin_tablet=”-25px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.5″ header_3_font=”|600|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#ffffff” background_color=”#e02b20″ width=”31%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”70px|||||” custom_padding=”5px|0px||0px|false|true”]

Best Practices

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.5″ text_text_color=”#CAE9FF” custom_margin=”-39px|||||” custom_padding=”|0px||||”]

Our partners love us because we vet a handful of wholesalers to work with. We love the control of working with a few instead of the many.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ custom_padding=”3px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.5″ header_3_font=”|600|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#ffffff” background_color=”#e02b20″ width=”35%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”7px|5px||5px|false|true”]

Got Questions?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.5″ header_2_font=”Open Sans|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#284667″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_3_font=”|600|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#e02b20″ custom_margin=”-9px||-12px|||” custom_padding=”0px|||||”]

FAQ’s

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_toggle title=”Where Will You Grow My Brand?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” closed_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ closed_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” icon_color=”#ba1a2f” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”20px” _builder_version=”4.4.5″ title_text_color=”#000000″ title_font=”|600||on|||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#000000″ animation_style=”zoom” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”#284667″ border_style_all=”ridge”]

With our ‘360 SparkDen Solution’, we use a combination of marketplaces, social media, organic content marketing, and paid advertising to grow your brand online.

 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”What If SparkDen Can’t Sell My Products?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” closed_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ closed_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” icon_color=”#ba1a2f” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”20px” _builder_version=”4.4.5″ title_text_color=”#000000″ title_font=”|600||on|||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#000000″ animation_style=”zoom” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”#284667″ border_style_all=”ridge”]

We are so confident in our purchasing agents’ ability to pick out winning products that, if your products don’t sell after we purchase them, we will eat the costs ourselves.

 

 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”How Much Space Do You Have For Our Products?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” closed_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ closed_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” icon_color=”#ba1a2f” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”20px” _builder_version=”4.4.5″ title_text_color=”#000000″ title_font=”|600||on|||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#000000″ animation_style=”zoom” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”#284667″ border_style_all=”ridge”]

In a word … unlimited. We not only use Amazon’s warehouse to tap into the Prime buyers, but we also have additional warehouses to store products that we sell on eBay and other marketplaces as well.

 

 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Do You Require Credit With Our Company?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” closed_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ closed_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” icon_color=”#ba1a2f” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”20px” _builder_version=”4.4.5″ title_text_color=”#000000″ title_font=”|600||on|||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#000000″ animation_style=”zoom” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”#284667″ border_style_all=”ridge”]

We prefer to pay for all products 100% up front with our bank account or credit card. We don’t require credit.

 

 

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″][et_pb_toggle title=”Where Will You Sell My Products?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” closed_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ closed_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” icon_color=”#ba1a2f” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”20px” _builder_version=”4.4.5″ title_text_color=”#000000″ title_font=”|600||on|||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#000000″ custom_padding=”138px|||||” animation_style=”zoom” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”#284667″ border_style_all=”ridge”]

After our specialists use our AI softwares, we will determine the best marketplaces for your brand. We specialize in brand growth on Amazon, Ebay, Google Shopping and Etsy.

 

 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”What Do You Need From A Wholesaler To Get Started?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” closed_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ closed_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” icon_color=”#ba1a2f” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”20px” _builder_version=”4.4.5″ title_text_color=”#000000″ title_font=”|600||on|||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#000000″ animation_style=”zoom” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”#284667″ border_style_all=”ridge”]

We pride ourselves in low maintenance relationships with our wholesalers. Instead of phone calls and meetings, all we need is an updated product & pricing sheet to get started.

 

 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”How Much Product Do You Usually Buy?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” closed_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ closed_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” icon_color=”#ba1a2f” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”20px” _builder_version=”4.4.5″ title_text_color=”#000000″ title_font=”|600||on|||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#000000″ animation_style=”zoom” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”#284667″ border_style_all=”ridge”]

We usually purchase according to your own minimum policies. After we fill out paperwork and get a product & pricing sheet, our strategists will get to work on our first order to meet your minimums.

 

 

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”How Can We Get Started?” open_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ open_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” closed_toggle_text_color=”#000000″ closed_toggle_background_color=”#ffffff” icon_color=”#ba1a2f” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”20px” _builder_version=”4.4.5″ title_text_color=”#000000″ title_font=”|600||on|||||” body_text_align=”left” body_text_color=”#000000″ animation_style=”zoom” border_width_all=”0px” border_color_all=”#284667″ border_style_all=”ridge”]

Simply contact us through our form or email us at info@sparkden.com with your product pricing sheet. We will then have our specialists determine if we are a great partnership fit.

 

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|||”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0.76)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0.77)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://sparkden.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/10-1.jpg” width=”100%” max_width=”2560px” custom_padding=”||0px|||” global_module=”230063″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.5″ animation_style=”fade”]

meta._et_pb_old_content:
Your 360 Solution

We've Been Waiting For You

Your Solution To Online Brand Growth

Your Wholesale Retailer

We’ll purchase your product and use our online infrastructure, inventory management tracking, and proven strategies to grow your brand online. 

Fulfillment

We have plenty of warehouse space to spare and also use Amazon FBA to tap into the Prime crowd.

Marketplaces

We have a department dedicated just to our marketplaces to ensure traffic, sales and growth.

Ads & PPC

We are so confident that we can grow your brand that we pay for all online ads and pay per click services ourselves.

Location. Location. Location.

Increase Sales

Wholesalers love to work with us when they discover that we use the best AI softwares to listen market needs to ensure sales.

Quality Over Quantity

The ROI Experts

Our partners love us because we vet a handful of wholesalers to work with. We love the control of working with a few instead of the many.

try, try again

Best Practices

Your brand is as important to us as it is to you. We will always follow logistical systems that include ultimate control over the brand.

Got Questions?

FAQ

Where Will You Grow My Brand?

With our ‘360 SparkDen Solution’, we use a combination of marketplaces, social media, organic content marketing and paid advertising to grow your brand online.

What If SparkDen Can't Sell My Products?

We are so confident in our purchasing agents’ ability to pick out winning products that, if your products don’t sell after we purchase them, we will eat the costs ourselves.

How Much Space Do You Have For Our Products?

In a word … unlimited. We not only use Amazon’s warehouse to tap into the Prime buyers, we have additional warehouses to store products that we sell on Ebay and other marketplaces as well.

Do You Require Credit With Our Company?

We prefer to pay for all products 100% up front with our bank account or credit card. We don’t require credit.

Where Will You Sell My Products?

After our specialists use our AI softwares, we will determine the best marketplaces for your brand. We specialize in brand growth on Amazon, Ebay, Google Shopping and Etsy.

What Do You Need From A Wholesaler To Get Started?

We pride ourselves in low maintenance relationships with our wholesalers. Instead of phone calls and meetings, all we need is an updated product & pricing sheet to get started.

How Much Product Do You Usually Buy?

We usually purchase according to your own minimum policies. After we fill out paperwork and get a product & pricing sheet, our strategists will get to work on our first order to meet your minimums.

How Can We Get Started?

Simply contact us through our form or email us at info@sparkden.com with your product pricing sheet. We will then have our specialists determine if we are a great partnership fit.
